name: WKExtendedRuntimeSession
desc: A session that continues to run your app after the user has stopped interacting.

items.name: var delegate: WKExtendedRuntimeSessionDelegate?
items.desc: A delegate object for monitoring the session and responding to state changes and errors.

items.name: protocol WKExtendedRuntimeSessionDelegate
items.desc: A set of optional methods for monitoring an extended runtime session.

items.name: func start(at: Date)
items.desc: Schedules a session to start running at a future date.

items.name: enum WKExtendedRuntimeSessionState
items.desc: The activation states for an extended runtime session.

items.name: var expirationDate: Date?
items.desc: The time and date when the session expires.

items.name: enum WKExtendedRuntimeSessionErrorCode
items.desc: The error codes reported by extended runtime sessions.

items.name: let WKExtendedRuntimeSessionErrorDomain: String
items.desc: The domain for errors reported by extended runtime sessions.
